data.name: Alien Dawn Demo
data.detailed_description:
FOR FULL INFOMRATION ON THIS GAME GO TO THE MAIN STORE PAGE HERE:


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1376580/Alien_Dawn/

We know that there are many different types of VR systems out there, as well as many different preferences on what gameplay options VR games have to offer.

We created this demo so you can make sure your VR system is compatible with the game, and that you like the gameplay options available in this game because we want anyone interested in this game to be happy with their purchase.

If you have any questions or need support there are many ways to get in touch with either of the two developers working on this game.




+ This demo contains 1 map and a 15 minute time limit

data.short_description: A 10+ Player CO-OP, VR & Desktop Crossplay Survival Action Game | Designed as a social experience, but can be played as a lone wolf too! | Active Devs | DEMO VERSION

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i9
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 22 GB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: There are realistic depictions of real world weapons, simulated violence, blood, and zombie dismemberment.
